hero.title: Where Tenderness Meets Tradition
hero.description: House of Ravya was born from a desire to bring India’s timeless textile heritage into the lives of families around the world.

story.title: Our Story
content:
At HOR, we collaborate with master artisans across India—reviving age‑old crafts like Ajrakh, hand block printing, and khadi weaving. Each piece is created slowly and mindfully, using natural materials and traditional processes that honor the earth and those who work with it.

Our journey is rooted in simplicity, authenticity, and emotion. We believe that what touches the skin of a baby or a beloved pet should be as honest and pure as the love they bring into our lives.

From the first thread to the final touch, every product carries a story of human hands, heritage, and heart. This is not just fashion—it is a homecoming to values we hold dear: warmth, comfort, and conscious living.

items.title: Artisan Craftsmanship
items.description: Handmade by Indian artisans using heritage techniques like Ajrakh, block printing, Jamdani, and IKAT. Every textile carries a story of tradition, care, and cultural pride.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: Natural fibres, eco‑friendly dyes, and intentional low‑impact processes that are safe for sensitive skin and the planet. Ethical, transparent, and waste‑conscious production.

items.title: Global Appeal
items.description: Design‑led craftsmanship and export‑ready quality for discerning international buyers. Bringing the soul of Indian artistry into homes worldwide.

items.title: Low MOQs & Certifications
items.description: Low MOQs, dedicated sampling team, 30–45 day turnaround, with recognised sustainability certifications.

team.title: Our Team
